root: ^Alright alright I've had my fun. Take it back to Big Brother already. But it fun while it lasted yeah? Like a game of hide-and-seek.
^It certainly made my first day more interesting.

fun: ^That's the spirit! Stick around Ward, the fun doesn't stop at hide and seek. Anyways, see you back at the Hayloft.
not_fun: ^I think that pain's just the stick you got wedged up there. You and Bargain-Bin-RoboCop are gonna be a pair. See you back at the Hayloft.
